context: You have built a multi-module application based on instructions including Monitoring, Feature Flags, Performance Optimization, Audit Trail, Access Control, and Design System.
goal: Perform a 1000% thorough QA and architecture audit for each module and overall structure, as a senior software architect.

actions.title: Stage Summary
check: What module/stage are you currently working on?

actions.title: Checkpoint Validation
actions.description: Verify all control points (checkpoints) were completed.

actions.title: File Overview
actions.description: List all files created/modified in the current module.

actions.title: Security Review
actions.description: Perform a security analysis of this module.
check: Sensitive data exposed in logs, errors, or URLs?
Are tokens, sessions, API keys handled securely?

check: Do the tests include edge cases and fail conditions?
